sub_title: Business Manger - Turquoise Europe (London Stock Exchange Group)
summary:
Ambitious, analytical, & accomplished professional with a BA. in Economics from the University of Nottingham & a progressive career at one of the largest diversified conglomerates in Sri Lanka where I have worked as a Financial Analyst and now as an offshore Team Lead in the largest Primary Stock Exchange in Europe.

I consider my analytical skills and attention to detail as well as my core communication, leadership and team-working abilities to be among my greatest strengths. Having led a fulfilling and challenging academic and tertiary life, I now wish to focus my attention more fully on a career at a reputed organization where I can capitalize my skills and talents while adding to the continued success of my employer.
